Package edu.cnm.deepdive.scalescroller.model.dao

Interface ScaleDao

  • public interface ScaleDao
    Provides an interface with methods that perform actions on the Scale table of the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Single<java.lang.Integer> delete​(Scale scale)
      Deletes a single scale from the database.
      Single<java.lang.Integer> delete​(Scale... scales)
      Deletes multiple scales from the database.
      Single<java.lang.Integer> delete​(java.util.Collection<Scale> scales)
      Deletes multiple scales from the database.
      Single<java.lang.Long> insert​(Scale scale)
      Inserts a single scale into the database.
      Single<java.util.List<java.lang.Long>> insert​(Scale... scales)
      Inserts multiple scales into the database.
      Single<java.util.List<java.lang.Long>> insert​(java.util.Collection<Scale> scales)
      Inserts multiple scales into the database.
      LiveData<Scale> select​(long id)
      Queries the database for a specific scale, based on id.
      LiveData<java.util.List<Scale>> selectAll()
      Queries the database for all scales.
      LiveData<java.util.List<Scale>> selectAllOrderByDifficulty()
      Queries the database for all scales, ordering based on difficulty.
      LiveData<java.util.List<Scale>> selectWithMode​(Mode mode)
      Queries the database for specific scales, based on mode.
      LiveData<Scale> selectWithScaleName​(Mode mode, Note tonic)
      Queries the database for a specific scale, based on tonic and mode.
      LiveData<java.util.List<Scale>> selectWithTonic​(Note tonic)
      Queries the database for specific scales, based on tonic.
      Single<java.lang.Integer> update​(Scale scale)
      Updates a single scale in the database.
      Single<java.lang.Integer> update​(Scale... scales)
      Updates multiple scales in the database.
      Single<java.lang.Integer> update​(java.util.Collection<Scale> scales)
      Updates multiple scales in the database.
